Header: Freak accidents claim a life and leave six in hospitals
Content: Five people were hospitalized after an electric pole fell on a three-wheeler in Morawaka area last night. Police said two children were among the injured. Meanwhile, a woman riding on a motorbike has died after a coconut tree fell on her in Eppawala- Galmaluwa area. Police said the son of the deceased, who was also riding the motorcycle, was hospitalized with injuries.
